Other IV treatments you may receive after you leave the hospital include: - Treatment for hormone deficiencies - Medicines for severe nausea that cancer chemotherapy or pregnancy may cause - Patient-controlled analgesia (PCA) for pain (this is IV medicine that patients give themselves) - Chemotherapy to treat cancer You or your child may need total parenteral nutrition (TPN) after a hospital stay.
